content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to check my computer's disk usage with the "df -h" command. The results show that my computer has 24% disk usage. I also used the "google" command to search for learning resources for children and received a list of websites including learningresources.com, savethechildren.org, scholastic.com, openculture.com, and metmuseum.org.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.scholastic.com/home", "question": "What are some interesting resources available on the Scholastic website for children?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of the resources available on the Scholastic website, including catalogs for education and trade products, literacy and math resources, book fairs and clubs, and teaching resources. The website also features book reviews, drawing tutorials, and information on new book releases. There is a focus on superhero stories and summer activities. Contact information for Scholastic representatives is provided. Additionally, the website promotes various resources for children, including workbooks for early learning, graphic novel adaptations of popular books, book reviews, superhero stories, and crafting activities. Scholastic's Little Skill Seekers Workbooks are advertised as a way to foster early literacy, numeracy, and cognitive skills through fun activities. Contact information for Scholastic representatives and customer support is also provided.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to main content (https://www.scholastic.com/home#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.scholastic.com/en)', 'Catalogs  (javscript:void(0))', 'Catalogs (https://export.scholastic.com/en/catalogs)', 'Education (https://export.scholastic.com/en/catalogs/education-material)']", type='action_result')]
"""
